title: I didn't get a mystery skin but I've never been chat restricted/banned
body:
Litterally never done anything toxic in league to get myself punished in anyway, so why?

I'm assuming they're still gving them out, and my Summoner Name starts with L so maybe they're going alphabetical or something lol.
Have any of you guys gotten yours yet? If you did, what'd you get :D I'm curious
